retrospective.translation[0].definitions: related to or thinking about the past
a law or decision that is retrospective is effective from a particular date in the past
Teachers settled for a 4.2% pay rise with retrospective effect from 1 April.
retrospective.translation[1].definitions: a show of the work of an artist, actor, film-maker etc that includes examples of all the kinds of work they have done
a retrospective of painter Hans Hofmann
